seo_title.de: Punta Bonfiglio Aussichtspunkt Manarola - Bester Fotoplatz Cinque Terre
seo_title.en: Punta Bonfiglio Viewpoint Manarola - Best Photo Spot Cinque Terre
seo_title.fr: Point Vue Punta Bonfiglio Manarola - Meilleur Spot Photo Cinque Terre
seo_title.it: Belvedere Punta Bonfiglio Manarola - Miglior Punto Foto Cinque Terre

seo_description.de: Erleben Sie den ikonischen Punta Bonfiglio Aussichtspunkt in Manarola mit atemberaubenden Panoramablicken und perfekten Fotomöglichkeiten.
seo_description.en: Experience the iconic Punta Bonfiglio viewpoint in Manarola with stunning panoramic views and perfect photo opportunities in Cinque Terre.
seo_description.fr: Découvrez l'emblématique point de vue Punta Bonfiglio à Manarola avec des vues panoramiques époustouflantes aux Cinque Terre.
seo_description.it: Vivi l'iconico belvedere di Punta Bonfiglio a Manarola con viste panoramiche mozzafiato e perfette opportunità fotografiche nelle Cinque Terre.

giuliaComment.en: I don't photograph from here anymore—I've taken that shot too many times. But I still go to watch others discover it. The moment when visitors see the full village for the first time, laid out like a painting—that wonder never gets old, even secondhand.
giuliaComment.de: Ich fotografiere nicht mehr von hier—ich habe dieses Foto zu oft gemacht. Aber ich gehe immer noch hin, um andere dabei zu beobachten, wie sie es entdecken. Der Moment, wenn Besucher das ganze Dorf zum ersten Mal sehen, ausgebreitet wie ein Gemaelde—dieses Staunen wird nie alt, auch nicht aus zweiter Hand.
giuliaComment.fr: Je ne photographie plus d'ici—j'ai pris cette photo trop de fois. Mais j'y vais encore pour regarder les autres la decouvrir. Le moment ou les visiteurs voient le village entier pour la premiere fois, etale comme une peinture—cette emerveillement ne vieillit jamais, meme de seconde main.
giuliaComment.it: Non fotografo piu da qui—ho scattato quella foto troppe volte. Ma ci vado ancora per guardare gli altri scoprirla. Il momento in cui i visitatori vedono l'intero villaggio per la prima volta, disteso come un dipinto—quella meraviglia non invecchia mai, anche di seconda mano.

signature.de: Wo das Dorf zur Kunst wird

intro.en: The spot that launched a thousand postcards—where the entire village becomes composition.
intro.de: Der Ort, der tausend Postkarten inspirierte—wo das gesamte Dorf zur Komposition wird.
intro.fr: L'endroit qui a lance mille cartes postales—ou tout le village devient composition.
intro.it: Il punto che ha lanciato mille cartoline—dove l'intero villaggio diventa composizione.

images.alt_text: Panoramic view of Manarola village from the overlook viewpoint showing colorful houses
Sunset view from Manarola overlook with golden light on village buildings
Aerial perspective of Manarola overlook viewpoint and surrounding area
Close-up view of the viewing platform and benches at Manarola overlook

details.unesco_status: Part of Cinque Terre UNESCO World Heritage Site
details.description_long: This is arguably the most iconic and Instagrammable viewpoint in all of Cinque Terre. The overlook sits on a small promontory above Manarola, offering unobstructed views of the village's famous pastel-colored houses stacked on the cliff, the tiny harbor below, and vineyards climbing the hills behind. The viewpoint is particularly magical at sunset when the buildings glow in golden light. The area includes a small park with benches and shaded areas. Nearby is the famous Nessun Dorma restaurant which shares similar views. This is the classic Cinque Terre postcard view that appears in countless photos and travel magazines.
details.description_short: The most famous and photographed viewpoint in Cinque Terre, offering iconic views of Manarola's colorful houses cascading down to the harbor.
details.historical_significance: Traditional Mediterranean coastal settlement dating back to Roman times

tripadvisor.ranking: #1 of 8 things to do in Manarola

reviews.text: Absolutely stunning viewpoint! The walk up is easy and the view is worth every step. Perfect for sunset photos. Gets very crowded so arrive early!
reviews.title: Most breathtaking view in Cinque Terre
reviews.author: Sarah_Travels2023

reviews.text: La vista più iconica delle Cinque Terre. Perfetto per il tramonto ma molto affollato in estate. Consiglio la mattina presto.
reviews.author: Marco Italiano

reviews.text: The view is spectacular and exactly what you see in all the photos. However, it's extremely crowded during peak hours. The small space means you might have to wait for a good photo spot.
reviews.title: Beautiful but busy
reviews.author: Jennifer_K

directions.from_harbor: Take main street (Via Discovolo) uphill towards Nessun Dorma, viewpoint is on walkway to the right

location.location_description: Small cape where cemetery is located, overlooking Manarola harbor and village

cons: 30-40 minute wait at Nessun Dorma nearby

practical_tips.local_secrets: The small path behind the cemetery offers an alternative, slightly less crowded viewing angle
photography_tips: Golden hour and sunset are magical

Multiple angles possible from different spots

seo_title.fr: Zone Baignade Manarola - Piscines Naturelles Cinque Terre
seo_title.it: Area Nuoto Manarola - Piscine Naturali Cinque Terre

seo_description.de: Entdecken Sie Manarolos natürlichen Schwimmbereich mit Felspools und kristallklarem Mittelmeer-Wasser zum Schwimmen und Sonnenbaden.
seo_description.en: Discover Manarola's natural swimming area with rocky pools and crystal clear Mediterranean waters perfect for swimming and sunbathing.
seo_description.fr: Découvrez la zone de baignade naturelle de Manarola avec des piscines rocheuses et des eaux méditerranéennes cristallines parfaites pour la natation.
seo_description.it: Scopri l'area di nuoto naturale di Manarola con piscine rocciose e acque cristalline del Mediterraneo perfette per nuotare e prendere il sole.

insider_tips.de: Reservierungen empfohlen, besonders für Sonnenuntergang-Dinner mit Aussicht
insider_tips.en: Reservations recommended, especially for sunset dinner with views
insider_tips.fr: Réservations recommandées, surtout pour dîner au coucher du soleil avec vue
insider_tips.it: Prenotazioni raccomandate, specialmente per cena al tramonto con vista

teaser.de: Essen mit Aussicht - spektakuläre Terrasse mit Blick auf Manarola
teaser.en: Dining with a view - spectacular terrace overlooking Manarola village
teaser.fr: Dîner avec vue - terrasse spectaculaire surplombant le village de Manarola
teaser.it: Cenare con vista - terrazza spettacolare che domina il paese di Manarola

description.de: Berühmtes Restaurant und Bar auf Punta Bonfiglio mit spektakulären Panoramablicken über Manarola bei lokaler Küche und Wein.
description.en: Famous restaurant and bar located on Punta Bonfiglio offering spectacular panoramic views over Manarola while enjoying local cuisine and wine.
description.fr: Célèbre restaurant et bar situé sur Punta Bonfiglio offrant des vues panoramiques spectaculaires sur Manarola en savourant cuisine locale et vin.
description.it: Famoso ristorante e bar situato a Punta Bonfiglio che offre viste panoramiche spettacolari su Manarola gustando cucina locale e vino.

location.address: Località Punta Bonfiglio, 19017 Manarola SP, Italy

seo_title.de: Restaurant Nessun Dorma Manarola - Essen mit Aussicht Cinque Terre
seo_title.en: Nessun Dorma Restaurant Manarola - Dining with Views Cinque Terre
seo_title.fr: Restaurant Nessun Dorma Manarola - Dîner avec Vue Cinque Terre
seo_title.it: Ristorante Nessun Dorma Manarola - Cenare con Vista Cinque Terre

seo_description.de: Speisen Sie im Restaurant Nessun Dorma in Manarola mit spektakulären Panoramablicken über das Dorf und Mittelmeer in Cinque Terre.
seo_description.en: Dine at Nessun Dorma restaurant in Manarola with spectacular panoramic views over the village and Mediterranean Sea in Cinque Terre.
seo_description.fr: Dînez au restaurant Nessun Dorma à Manarola avec des vues panoramiques spectaculaires sur le village et la Méditerranée aux Cinque Terre.
seo_description.it: Cena al ristorante Nessun Dorma a Manarola con viste panoramiche spettacolari sul paese e Mar Mediterraneo nelle Cinque Terre.

insider_tips.de: Oft geschlossen, aber Außenarchitektur ist von der Straße aus bewundernswert
insider_tips.en: Often closed but exterior architecture is worth admiring from the street
insider_tips.fr: Souvent fermé mais l'architecture extérieure mérite d'être admirée depuis la rue
insider_tips.it: Spesso chiuso ma l'architettura esterna merita di essere ammirata dalla strada

teaser.de: Mittelalterliches Oratorium mit kostbarer religiöser Kunst und spirituellem Erbe
teaser.en: Medieval oratory with precious religious art and spiritual heritage
teaser.fr: Oratoire médiéval avec art religieux précieux et patrimoine spirituel
teaser.it: Oratorio medievale con preziosa arte religiosa e patrimonio spirituale

description.de: Kleines mittelalterliches Oratorium aus dem 15. Jahrhundert mit religiöser Kunst als historisches Zeugnis des spirituellen Lebens von Manarola.
description.en: Small medieval oratory dating from the 15th century, featuring religious art and serving as a historical testament to the spiritual life of Manarola.
description.fr: Petit oratoire médiéval du XVe siècle, avec art religieux et témoignage historique de la vie spirituelle de Manarola.
description.it: Piccolo oratorio medievale del XV secolo, con arte religiosa e testimonianza storica della vita spirituale di Manarola.

visiting.hours: By appointment or during special events

seo_title.de: Oratorio dei Disciplinanti Manarola - Mittelalterliches Oratorium Cinque Terre
seo_title.en: Oratorio dei Disciplinanti Manarola - Medieval Oratory Cinque Terre

seo_description.de: Besuchen Sie das historische Oratorio dei Disciplinanti in Manarola, ein mittelalterliches Oratorium aus dem 15. Jahrhundert mit religiöser Kunst.
seo_description.en: Visit the historic Oratorio dei Disciplinanti in Manarola, a 15th-century medieval oratory with religious art and spiritual heritage.

insider_tips.de: Wanderwege-Zustand prüfen und Wanderstiefel und Wasser mitbringen
insider_tips.en: Check trail conditions and bring hiking boots and water

insider_tips.it: Controllare le condizioni del sentiero e portare scarponi da trekking e acqua

teaser.de: Ikonischer Küstenwanderweg verbindet Cinque Terre Dörfer
teaser.en: Iconic coastal hiking trail connecting Cinque Terre villages
teaser.fr: Sentier de randonnée côtier emblématique reliant les villages des Cinque Terre
teaser.it: Iconico sentiero escursionistico costiero che collega i paesi delle Cinque Terre

description.de: Der berühmte Blaue Weg verbindet alle fünf Dörfer der Cinque Terre, mit Manarola als zentralem Knotenpunkt für spektakuläre Küstenwanderungen.
description.en: The famous Blue Trail connecting all five villages of Cinque Terre, with Manarola serving as a central hub offering spectacular coastal hiking.
description.fr: Le célèbre Sentier Bleu reliant les cinq villages des Cinque Terre, avec Manarola servant de hub central pour des randonnées côtières spectaculaires.
description.it: Il famoso Sentiero Azzurro che collega tutti e cinque i paesi delle Cinque Terre, con Manarola come hub centrale per escursioni costiere spettacolari.

location.address: Coastal path connecting Cinque Terre villages via Manarola

best_time.de: Frühling und Herbst für kühlere Temperaturen
best_time.en: Spring and fall for cooler temperatures
best_time.fr: Printemps et automne pour des températures plus fraîches
best_time.it: Primavera e autunno per temperature più fresche

seo_title.de: Sentiero Azzurro Blauer Weg Manarola - Cinque Terre Wandern
seo_title.en: Sentiero Azzurro Blue Trail Manarola - Cinque Terre Hiking
seo_title.fr: Sentiero Azzurro Manarola - Randonnée Cinque Terre
seo_title.it: Sentiero Azzurro Manarola - Trekking Cinque Terre

seo_description.de: Wandern Sie den berühmten Sentiero Azzurro durch Manarola mit spektakulären Küstenblicken, der alle Cinque Terre Dörfer verbindet.
seo_description.en: Hike the famous Sentiero Azzurro Blue Trail through Manarola with spectacular coastal views connecting all Cinque Terre villages.
seo_description.fr: Randonnez sur le célèbre Sentiero Azzurro à travers Manarola avec des vues côtières spectaculaires reliant tous les villages des Cinque Terre.
seo_description.it: Percorri il famoso Sentiero Azzurro attraverso Manarola con viste costiere spettacolari che collega tutti i paesi delle Cinque Terre.

insider_tips.de: Kamera und Wasser mitbringen, bequeme Wanderschuhe tragen
insider_tips.en: Bring camera and water, wear comfortable hiking shoes
insider_tips.fr: Apporter appareil photo et eau, porter chaussures de randonnée confortables
insider_tips.it: Portare macchina fotografica e acqua, indossare scarpe da trekking comode

teaser.de: Erhöhter Wanderweg mit Panoramablicken über Dorf und Meer
teaser.en: Elevated hiking trail with panoramic views over village and sea
teaser.fr: Sentier de randonnée élevé avec vues panoramiques sur village et mer
teaser.it: Sentiero escursionistico elevato con viste panoramiche su paese e mare

description.de: Malerischer Wanderweg über Manarola mit erhöhten Blicken über Dorf, Weinberge und Mittelmeerküste durch Olivenhaine und Terrassen.
description.en: Scenic hiking trail above Manarola offering elevated views over the village, vineyards, and Mediterranean coastline through olive groves and terraces.
description.fr: Sentier de randonnée pittoresque au-dessus de Manarola offrant des vues élevées sur le village, vignobles et côte méditerranéenne.
description.it: Sentiero escursionistico panoramico sopra Manarola con viste elevate sul paese, vigneti e costa mediterranea attraverso oliveti e terrazze.

location.address: Trail above Manarola village, 19017 Manarola SP, Italy

best_time.de: Früher Morgen oder später Nachmittag für beste Beleuchtung
best_time.en: Early morning or late afternoon for best lighting
best_time.fr: Tôt le matin ou en fin d'après-midi pour le meilleur éclairage
best_time.it: Prima mattina o tardo pomeriggio per la migliore illuminazione

seo_description.de: Wandern Sie den malerischen Manarola Aussichtspunkt Wanderweg mit Panoramablicken über Dorf, Weinberge und Mittelmeerküste.
seo_description.en: Hike the scenic Manarola Overlook Trail with panoramic views over the village, vineyards, and Mediterranean coast in Cinque Terre.

teaser.en: Local wine cooperative showcasing authentic Cinque Terre wines and traditions
teaser.fr: Coopérative vinicole locale présentant vins authentiques et traditions des Cinque Terre

description.de: Weingenossenschaft und Verkostungsraum mit lokalen Cinque Terre Weinen, einschließlich berühmtem Sciacchetrà, mit Bildungsausstellungen über Weinbau-Traditionen.
description.en: Wine cooperative and tasting room showcasing local Cinque Terre wines, including the famous Sciacchetrà, with educational displays about winemaking traditions.

description.it: Cooperativa vinicola e sala degustazione con vini locali delle Cinque Terre, incluso il famoso Sciacchetrà, con mostre educative sulle tradizioni vinicole.

seo_title.it: Cooperativa Agricola Cinque Terre Manarola - Degustazione Vini

seo_description.de: Besuchen Sie die Cooperativa Agricola Cinque Terre in Manarola für authentische lokale Weinverkostung einschließlich berühmtem Sciacchetrà.

insider_tips.de: Am besten über den Pfad vom Friedhof für einfacheren Zugang erreichbar
insider_tips.en: Best accessed via the path from the cemetery for easier approach
insider_tips.fr: Mieux accessible par le sentier depuis le cimetière pour approche plus facile
insider_tips.it: Meglio accessibile tramite il sentiero dal cimitero per un approccio più facile

teaser.de: Historische Wachturm-Ruinen mit Küstenverteidigungsgeschichte und Meerblick

teaser.fr: Ruines historiques de tour de guet avec histoire défense côtière et vues mer
teaser.it: Ruderi storici di torre di guardia con storia di difesa costiera e vista mare

history.en: Medieval defensive structure built to warn against Saracen raids
history.fr: Structure défensive médiévale construite pour alerter contre les raids sarrasins
history.it: Struttura difensiva medievale costruita per avvertire contro i raid saraceni

description.de: Überreste eines alten Wachturms, der einst Manarola vor Piratenangriffen schützte, mit historischer Bedeutung und Panorama-Küstenblicken.
description.en: Remains of an ancient watchtower that once protected Manarola from pirate attacks, offering historical significance and panoramic coastal views.
description.fr: Vestiges d'une ancienne tour de guet qui protégeait autrefois Manarola des attaques de pirates, avec signification historique et vues côtières panoramiques.
description.it: Resti di un'antica torre di guardia che un tempo proteggeva Manarola dagli attacchi dei pirati, con significato storico e viste panoramiche costiere.

location.address: Hillside above Manarola harbor, 19017 Manarola SP, Italy

insider_tips.de: Viel Wasser und Sonnenschutz mitbringen, Weg hat begrenzten Schatten

teaser.fr: Spectaculaire sentier côtier avec vues vignobles entre villages
teaser.it: Spettacolare sentiero costiero con viste sui vigneti tra i paesi

description.de: Anspruchsvoller aber lohnender Wanderweg von Corniglia nach Manarola durch Weinberge, Olivenhaine mit spektakulären Küstenpanoramen.
description.en: Challenging but rewarding hiking trail connecting Corniglia to Manarola through vineyards, olive groves, and offering spectacular coastal panoramas.

best_time.en: Spring and fall for moderate temperatures

seo_description.de: Wandern Sie den anspruchsvollen Corniglia-Manarola Weg mit spektakulären Küstenblicken durch Weinberge und Olivenhaine.
seo_description.en: Hike the challenging Corniglia-Manarola trail with spectacular coastal views through vineyards and olive groves in Cinque Terre.

insider_tips.de: In der Hauptsaison im Voraus buchen, Sonnenschutz und Seekrankheit-Medikamente mitbringen
insider_tips.en: Book in advance during peak season, bring sun protection and seasickness medication
insider_tips.fr: Réserver à l'avance pendant haute saison, apporter protection solaire et médicaments mal de mer
insider_tips.it: Prenotare in anticipo durante alta stagione, portare protezione solare e farmaci mal di mare

description.en: Small marina offering boat tours and excursions along the Cinque Terre coast, providing unique perspectives of the villages from the sea.

seo_description.de: Erleben Sie Cinque Terre vom Meer mit Bootstouren ab Manarola Marina mit einzigartigen Küstenperspektiven und malerischen Ausflügen.
seo_description.en: Experience Cinque Terre from the sea with boat tours departing from Manarola Marina, offering unique coastal perspectives and scenic excursions.

seo_description.it: Vivi le Cinque Terre dal mare con tour in barca dalla Marina di Manarola, offrendo prospettive costiere uniche ed escursioni panoramiche.
